page.title: 05 Mistley Police
page.content: At Mistley{police}station there are 4 P.C's, 1 sergeant and 1 {detective}and they are responsible for{law and order}in the area of Dedham, Mistley, Langham, Lawford, Bradfield, Great Bromley and Wix When our local{policeman}gets in to work he has to look through his paperwork which usually takes him about 1\ hours. Then he goes out in his car. When he is out of his office he can do what he likes. Sometimes he goes to pick up fines or sorts out gun licences and tells people when they are in court. He deals with car crashes, speeding cars, people without seatbelts and drunken drivers. He has to deal with stray dogs and burglars. An important part of his work is helping children.
